summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 35th Avenue Northeast, from East 47th Street to East 50th Street; by the construction of watermains, together with fire hydrants and the necessary appurtenances, all in accordance with Resolution No. 8942 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
